## Short bio

I hold permanent position at Scientific Computing Program [PROCC](http://www.procc.fiocruz.br), [Fiocruz](https://portal.fiocruz.br/en), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. I consider myself an applied Bayesian biostatistician devoting my work to help solving problems on infectious diseases surveillance. I am a registred statistician at the [CONRE2](http://www.conre2.org.br/). And I spent some time in London working infectious disease modelling at the [CMMID](https://www.lshtm.ac.uk/research/centres/centre-mathematical-modelling-infectious-diseases)/[LSHTM](https://www.lshtm.ac.uk/), UK. My main research interests are on developing Bayesian statistical solutions/models to applied real problems, usually research questions related to infectious diseases epidemics.
